Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class NetworkLayerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.NetworkLayerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, View
public class NetworkLayerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View, Observer
This is the virtual view for the server. It receives updates from the model and sends them through the connection to its corresponding "real" view in the client. If the message is generated through a model update the model must pass the message with the update method.

    void askAction​(TurnState state)
